thread.title: D.R.A.M. Performs With Erykah Badu on “Kimmel,” Becomes a Puppet for “Cute” Video: Watch
thread.title_full: D.R.A.M. Performs With Erykah Badu on “Kimmel,” Becomes a Puppet for “Cute” Video: Watch

author: Sam Sodomsky
title: D.R.A.M. Performs With Erykah Badu on “Kimmel,” Becomes a Puppet for “Cute” Video: Watch
text:
D.R.A.M. Performs With Erykah Badu on “Kimmel,” Becomes a Puppet for “Cute” Video: Watch The Big Baby D.R.A.M. visual tells the love story of Puppet D.R.A.M. 
Last night, D.R.A.M. was the musical guest on “ Jimmy Kimmel Live .” He performed “ WiFi ” with Erykah Badu . Check that out here . Today, D.R.A.M. has shared the music video for his Big Baby D.R.A.M. cut “ Cute .” In it, he gets a puppet version of himself, which ends up going on a series of dates before falling in love with another puppet. Watch the clip below. 
In an interview last year, Badu revealed that she and D.R.A.M. were working on an EP together . “He’s this enigma,” she said. “If George Clinton, Ol’ Dirty Bastard and D’Angelo had a baby, that’s D.R.A.M.” 
Watch D.R.A.M. on Pitchfork.tv’s “Over/Under”: Artists In This Story
